amendment.description: To provide for use of model aircraft for recreational and other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 86 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 86 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Inhofe. (consideration: CR S830-833; text: CR S832) To provide for use of model aircraft for recreational and other purposes.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 86 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 86 proposed by Senator Hutchison for Senator Inhofe.
